segments.text: Mr . Mass , here is a gift for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a souvenir I bought for you from Rome .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How beautiful ! I love it at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very kind of you . I really don't know how I can thank you enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . Just a little thing I did .
segments.speaker: S1
